import React from 'react'; const localeOptions = { style:'currency', currency:'GBP', minimumFractionDigits: 0, maximumFractionDigits: 0 } export const CalculatorControls = props => { return(
{parseInt(props.baseSalary).toLocaleString('en-GB', localeOptions)} props.setbaseSalary(event.target.value) } />
{parseInt(props.depositAmount).toLocaleString('en-GB', localeOptions)} props.setDepositAmount(event.target.value) } />
{props.mortgageTerm} Years props.setMortgageTerm(event.target.value) } />
{props.interestRate}% props.setInterestRate(event.target.value) } />
); }
